error TS2351: This expression is not constructable.
  Type 'B' has no construct signatures.


!!! error TS2351: This expression is not constructable.
!!! error TS2351:   Type 'B' has no construct signatures.
==== newAbstractInstance.ts (0 errors) ====
    abstract class B { }
    declare const b: B;
    new b();
